# Setup
exec privage init

# Add a credential
exec privage add credential mycred
stdout 'Login:'
stdout 'Password:'

# List
exec privage list
stdout 'mycred'
stdout 'credential'

# Show
exec privage show mycred
stdout 'Login:'
stdout 'Password:'

# Delete
exec privage delete mycred
! exists mycred.age

# Verify deletion
exec privage list
! stdout 'mycred'
